page.title: 12THE LINEAR PARK, BATH.
page.content: The Linear Park was where the{Somerset {& Dorset Jointed}railway lines were, but they have been removed and made into a footpath.The main SDJR & LMS station was Green Park station in Bath.Trains travelled up from the main station entering the{Devonshire tunnel and coming out at{Lyncombe Vale. Linear Park was created on the 8 September 1969.The Pines Express came through the Devonshire tunnel.The nickname was the{"Slow & Dirty" railway. The trains were mainly passenger and freight.The line went on to Bournemouth station.The Somerset & Dorset opened in 1882.On one day it rained non-stop and flooded the lines.
